Howdy fellers, if you get the disc error image on any ps2 console, and it's modded, you need to change the dvd region configuration to 2 for this release to work properly, this is a U.s.a launch, Google it up to find out how according to your videogame's mod chip.  Summing it up: Change your DVD Region settings from the firmware to 2 to be able to read the disc, specially if you're outside usa.

For T.Bor92 and others experiencing this issue. go to mediafire and download the free NTSC to PAL converter. This download is NTSC and you will experience this issue if your PS2 is in PAL mode (normally from europe). Use the converter NTSC to PAL (which take 2 secs max) then burn the image to 4.7 DVD-R and it will work perfectly.
